name: Citadale - Curse of Darkness
description:
Step into the hellhouse once again...

The Dark Lord of old is destroyed, but his dark power still eminates from Citadale island. You are Gabriel Dorleac, son of Sonja Dorleac, and you have arrived back at Citadale with business. Find a way to lure out the monsters hiding on the island and kill them. Sometimes this task is easy, sometimes it's hard. Each of the six stages has a different riddle to solve. Failure is not an option!

- More retro goodness
- 8 bit pixel art and chiptune music
- Six stages filled with riddles, traps and secrets
- Multiple endings

This game is included in 'Citadale - The Legends Trilogy'
